Keywords: Avengers , Black Order , Brute , Cosmic , Illuminati , Infinity Watch , Minions of Thanos
Real Name: Thanos
Special Powers
ALLOW ME TO CARRY ON YOUR FRIEND'S LEGACY: When a friendly character of 50 or more points with the Avengers keyword is KO'd, give Thanos a Control token.
YOU CHALLENGE ME TO A CONTEST OF DEATH?: Charge/Running Shot. // If Thanos has a Control token, once per turn when Thanos attacks, after resolutions another friendly character within 4 squares with the Avengers keyword may make an attack.
AVENGERS ASSEMBLE!: Leadership, Probability Control. // If Thanos has a Control Token, when he uses leadership friendly characters with the Avengers keyword modify the following combat values based on his Leadership roll until your next turn. 2-3: +1 attack. 4-5: +1 damage. 6: +1 Attack and Damage.
Trade Thanos Want Thanos

Roderic_Cliche
There are a great many Avengers keyworded figures that are 50 points and 3 clicks long. Barring some shenanigans of some kind, your fastest KO would be something like this: Win map roll, going to Muspelheim. Set a Telephone Booth in the Lava. Go stand in said Telephone Booth, taking 1 unavoidable for FREE. Burn at the end of the turn for 1 unavoidable. Burn again at the end of your opponent's first turn. Thanos goes into overdrive starting turn 2. That should work, right? Wrong?

October 27, 2021
Goop
One of the better chases in the set. Whenever he attacks (doesn't even have to hit) you get another free attack with another Avenger. Thats just incredible! Then his damage power with leadership/prob and stat boosting is great too. Well worth his high 150pt cost considering how many extra attacks you get. I am really annoyed though he got all those keywords and yet all his special powers apply ONLY to Avengers. grrr
